LanguageData.Expedition33_SacredHealing.label: sacred healing
LanguageData.Expedition33_SacredHealing.description: Accelerated regeneration thanks to sacred light.
LanguageData.Expedition33_SacredBlindness.label: sacred blindness
LanguageData.Expedition33_SacredBlindness.description: Blinded by divine light, accuracy greatly reduced.
LanguageData.Expedition33_DivineRegeneration.label: divine regeneration
LanguageData.Expedition33_DivineRegeneration.descript: Powerful divine regeneration from the Bishop.
LanguageData.Expedition33_RapidMovement.label: rapid movement
LanguageData.Expedition33_RapidMovementBuff.label: rapid movement
LanguageData.Expedition33_HeavyArmor.label: reinforced armor
LanguageData.Expedition33_HeavyArmor.description: Heavy protection that massively reduces damage.
LanguageData.Expedition33_HeavyArmorBuff.label: reinforced armor
LanguageData.Expedition33_HeavyArmorBuff.description: Heavy protection that massively reduces damage.
LanguageData.Expedition33_SlowRegeneration.label: slow regeneration
LanguageData.Expedition33_SlowRegenerationBuff.label: slow regeneration
LanguageData.Expedition33_EnergyShields.label: energy shields
LanguageData.Expedition33_EnergyShieldsBuff.label: energy shields
LanguageData.Expedition33_LightConfusion.label: light confusion
LanguageData.Expedition33_LightConfusion.description: Confused by the Lampmaster's light displays, vision and accuracy are impaired.
LanguageData.Expedition33_LightBlindness.label: light blindness
LanguageData.Expedition33_LightBlindness.description: Blinded by the Dualist's light strike.
LanguageData.Expedition33_LightBurn.label: light burn
LanguageData.Expedition33_LightBurn.description: This character has been severely burned by supernatural light, affecting their vision and abilities.
LanguageData.Expedition33_LightMode.label: light mode
LanguageData.Expedition33_LightMode.description: The Dualist is in light mode, resistant to dark attacks.
LanguageData.Expedition33_DarkMode.label: dark mode
LanguageData.Expedition33_DarkMode.description: The Dualist is in dark mode, resistant to light attacks.
LanguageData.Expedition33_DarknessEffect.label: darkness effect
LanguageData.Expedition33_DarknessEffect.description: Vision, reflexes and morale considerably reduced by dark forces.
LanguageData.Expedition33_DarknessCurse.label: darkness curse
LanguageData.Expedition33_DarknessCurse.description: This character is victim of a dark curse that weakens their mental and physical abilities.
LanguageData.Expedition33_DarknessSlow.label: darkness slow
LanguageData.Expedition33_DarknessSlow.description: Slowed by the dark explosion, movement and reflexes diminished.
LanguageData.Expedition33_DarknessDebuff.label: dark mist
LanguageData.Expedition33_DarknessDebuff.description: This character is plunged in darkness, reducing their motor and mental faculties.
LanguageData.Expedition33_ObscurEffect.label: dark shock
LanguageData.Expedition33_ObscurEffect.description: This character's mind is affected by a wave of dark energy, causing confusion and disorientation.
LanguageData.Expedition33_LampMastery.label: lamp mastery
LanguageData.Expedition33_LampMastery.description: Surrounded by spectral lamp energy, benefits from a protective aura.
LanguageData.Expedition33_LampCurse.label: lamp curse
LanguageData.Expedition33_LampCurse.description: Cursed by dark lamps, suffer random harmful effects.
LanguageData.Expedition33_FrancoisTerror.label: François terror
LanguageData.Expedition33_FrancoisTerror.description: Terrified by François's deadly presence. All abilities are drastically reduced.
LanguageData.Expedition33_CommanderBoost.label: commander boost
LanguageData.Expedition33_CommanderBoost.description: Inspired by Renoir's tactical orders, all combat abilities are enhanced.
LanguageData.Expedition33_SonicStun.label: sonic stun
LanguageData.Expedition33_SonicStun.description: Stunned by the Siren's sonic wave. Movement slowed and abilities reduced.
LanguageData.Expedition33_MindControlled.label: mind controlled
LanguageData.Expedition33_MindControlled.description: Mind dominated by the Siren. Acts temporarily as an enemy against former allies.
LanguageData.Expedition33_FaceShifted.label: face shifted
LanguageData.Expedition33_FaceShifted.description: Identity temporarily modified by the Faces. Relations and recognition are disturbed.
LanguageData.Expedition33_IdentityConfusion.label: identity confusion
LanguageData.Expedition33_IdentityConfusion.descripti: Confused about their own identity and that of others. May mistakenly attack allies.
LanguageData.Expedition33_FaceShiftBuff.label: face change
LanguageData.Expedition33_FaceShiftBuff.description: This character goes through a destabilizing trance, completely changing their identity in the eyes of others.
LanguageData.Expedition33_DualityShiftBuff.label: duality form
LanguageData.Expedition33_DualityShiftBuff.descriptio: This character is temporarily infused with the powers of light and shadow, multiplying their abilities.
LanguageData.Expedition33_FearAuraHediff.label: terror aura
LanguageData.Expedition33_FearAuraHediff.description: Paralyzed by supernatural terror. All abilities are drastically reduced by fear.
LanguageData.Expedition33_RealityDistorted.label: reality distorted
LanguageData.Expedition33_RealityDistorted.descriptio: This character's mind is affected by a fundamental anomaly in the space-time fabric.
LanguageData.Expedition33_GommageCountdown.label: gommage countdown
LanguageData.Expedition33_GommageCountdown.descriptio: A deadly number has been inscribed! The countdown to disappearance begins...
LanguageData.Expedition33_CosmicPaint.label: cosmic paint
LanguageData.Expedition33_CosmicPaint.description: Marked by the Paintress's cosmic brush. Reality warps around you.
LanguageData.Expedition33_NumberCurse.label: number curse
LanguageData.Expedition33_NumberCurse.description: A harmful number has been inscribed on you. Its random effects manifest unpredictably.
LanguageData.Expedition33_TimeConfusion.label: time confusion
LanguageData.Expedition33_TimeConfusion.description: Caught in the Paintress's temporal distortions. Time seems to flow differently.
LanguageData.Expedition33_MonolithCurse.label: monolith curse
LanguageData.Expedition33_MonolithCurse.description: Marked by the ancient power of the Monolith. A cosmic curse befalls you.
LanguageData.Expedition33_QuestTracker.label: Expedition 33 quest tracker
LanguageData.Expedition33_QuestTracker.description: Tracks the main narrative progression of Expedition 33.
LanguageData.Expedition33_GommageProtection.label: anti-gommage protection
LanguageData.Expedition33_GommageProtection.descripti: Protected against Gommage effects by a personal shield. This mystical protection shimmers around the bearer.
LanguageData.Expedition33_AntiGommageProtection.label: anti-gommage protection
LanguageData.Expedition33_AntiGommageProtection.descr: This person is protected against Gommage effects by an energy field.
LanguageData.Expedition33_ArtisticCorruption.label: artistic corruption
LanguageData.Expedition33_ArtisticCorruption.descript: Exposed to the Paintress's energies, this colonist develops "artistic stains" that alter their perception of reality.
LanguageData.Expedition33_GommageResistance.label: gommage resistance
LanguageData.Expedition33_GommageResistance.descripti: This colonist has developed natural resistance to Gommage effects after prolonged exposure to anti-Gommage technologies.
LanguageData.Expedition33_ArtisticInspiration.label: artistic inspiration
LanguageData.Expedition33_ArtisticInspiration.descrip: Inspired by the fight against the Paintress, this colonist feels enhanced creativity and renewed motivation.
LanguageData.Expedition33_ShieldExhaustion.label: shield exhaustion
LanguageData.Expedition33_ShieldExhaustion.descriptio: This colonist's anti-Gommage shield is exhausted. They are temporarily vulnerable to Gommage effects.
LanguageData.Expedition33_GommageWitness.label: gommage witness
LanguageData.Expedition33_GommageWitness.description: This colonist witnessed a Gommage event. The trauma of seeing people disappear from reality leaves deep psychological scars.
LanguageData.Expedition33_SanctuaryBlessing.label: sanctuary blessing
LanguageData.Expedition33_SanctuaryBlessing.descripti: This colonist has spent time in the Temporal Sanctuary. Exposure to temporal energies grants exceptional serenity and mental clarity.
LanguageData.Expedition33_PilgrimageBlessing.label: pilgrimage blessing
LanguageData.Expedition33_PilgrimageBlessing.descript: This Gestral participated in a spiritual pilgrimage to the Sacred River, bringing inner peace and ancestral wisdom.
LanguageData.Expedition33_AncestralBlessing.label: ancestral blessing
LanguageData.Expedition33_AncestralBlessing.descripti: This Gestral feels the benevolent presence of their ancestors, giving them strength and wisdom.
LanguageData.Expedition33_RegenerationBuff.label: active regeneration
LanguageData.Expedition33_IronWillBuff.label: iron will
LanguageData.Expedition33_BerserkerRageBuff.label: berserker rage
LanguageData.Expedition33_BerserkerRageBuff.descripti: Destructive rage that increases damage but reduces defense.
LanguageData.Expedition33_TimeSlipBuff.label: time slip
LanguageData.Expedition33_IronSkinBuff.label: iron skin
LanguageData.Expedition33_IronSkinBuff.description: Magical protection that drastically reduces damage taken.
LanguageData.Expedition33_FortressBuff.label: fortress
LanguageData.Expedition33_FortressBuff.description: Near-total protection against all types of damage.
LanguageData.Expedition33_LuckyStrikeBuff.label: lucky strike
LanguageData.Expedition33_LuckyStrikeBuff.description: Greatly improved accuracy for the next attack.
LanguageData.Expedition33_MiracleBuff.label: divine protection
LanguageData.Expedition33_ImmortalityBuff.label: immortality fragment
LanguageData.Expedition33_ImmortalityBuff.description: Rapid regeneration thanks to Verso's immortal nature.
LanguageData.Expedition33_FastHealing.label: fast healing
LanguageData.GestralGrowthStages.label: gestral growth
LanguageData.GestralGrowthStages.description: This Gestral's size evolves according to their age.
LanguageData.Expedition33_PictoBonus_Vitality.label: picto imprint - vitality
LanguageData.Expedition33_PictoBonus_Vitality.descrip: Bonus granted by a vitality picto.
LanguageData.Expedition33_PictoBonus_Defense.label: picto imprint - defense
LanguageData.Expedition33_PictoBonus_Defense.descript: Bonus granted by a defense picto.
LanguageData.Expedition33_PictoBonus_Critical.label: picto imprint - critical
LanguageData.Expedition33_PictoBonus_Critical.descrip: Bonus granted by a critical picto.
LanguageData.Expedition33_PictoBonus_Guardian.label: picto imprint - guardian
LanguageData.Expedition33_PictoBonus_Guardian.descrip: Bonus granted by a guardian picto.
LanguageData.Expedition33_PictoBonus_Striker.label: picto imprint - striker
LanguageData.Expedition33_PictoBonus_Striker.descript: Bonus granted by a striker picto.
LanguageData.Expedition33_PictoBonus_Healer.label: picto imprint - healer
LanguageData.Expedition33_PictoBonus_Healer.descripti: Bonus granted by a healer picto.
LanguageData.Expedition33_PictoBonus_Scholar.label: picto imprint - scholar
LanguageData.Expedition33_PictoBonus_Scholar.descript: Bonus granted by a scholar picto.
LanguageData.Expedition33_Lumina_Guardian.label: Lumina Guardian
LanguageData.Expedition33_Lumina_Vitality.label: Lumina Vitality
LanguageData.Expedition33_Lumina_Defense.label: Lumina Defense
LanguageData.Expedition33_Lumina_Critical.label: Lumina Critical
LanguageData.Expedition33_Lumina_Striker.label: Lumina Striker
LanguageData.Expedition33_Lumina_Healer.label: Lumina Healer
LanguageData.Expedition33_Lumina_Scholar.label: Lumina Scholar
LanguageData.Expedition33_Progression.label: expedition progression
LanguageData.Expedition33_VitalityBonus.label: enhanced vitality
LanguageData.Expedition33_VitalityBonus.description: Permanent vitality bonus obtained through expedition progression.
LanguageData.Expedition33_PowerBonus.label: devastating power
LanguageData.Expedition33_PowerBonus.description: Permanent power bonus obtained through expedition progression.
LanguageData.Expedition33_AgilityBonus.label: extraordinary agility
LanguageData.Expedition33_AgilityBonus.description: Permanent agility bonus obtained through expedition progression.
LanguageData.Expedition33_DefenseBonus.label: unshakeable defense
LanguageData.Expedition33_DefenseBonus.description: Permanent defense bonus obtained through expedition progression.
LanguageData.Expedition33_ChanceBonus.label: miraculous luck
LanguageData.Expedition33_ChanceBonus.description: Permanent luck bonus obtained through expedition progression.
LanguageData.Expedition33_LevelBonus.label: expedition wisdom
LanguageData.Expedition33_LevelBonus.description: Wisdom and experience gained during Expedition 33.
LanguageData.Expedition33_GommageCountdownAnxiety.des: This colonist saw the Gommage process trigger but no one died. Watching the cursed age approach and count down remains deeply disturbing, even though the danger was avoided.
LanguageData.Expedition33_AntiPaintressMotivation.des: This colonist survived a Gommage event. Their survival reinforces their determination to definitively defeat the Paintress. Tomorrow Will Come
